name: Yabura - The Master of Bricks
description:
This game's a project for the Gdevelop 1# Game Jam! Developed in 7 days, using the awesome sprites from Grafxkid!

In Yabura - The Master of Bricks, you have the ability to create bricks in order to help get thru the level. You can also delete/recover the bricks that you created to build different paths!

This game's my first project getting to public and also my first ever game jam! :P

WASD - Move | SPACE - Jump

Left Mouse - Create Brick | Right Mouse - Recover Brick

R -  restart the game (clears all the checkpoint data).

Enjoy!!
